intro.html:
Stat Phys Neuro 2022

ðŸ‘‹ Welcome to neuroscience & statistical physics workshop, be held at SISSA in Trieste, Italy, between 06.-08.06.2022.

This workshop will bring together a diverse and international set of speakers across physics, neuroscience, cognitive science and artificial intelligence, and provide a forum for discussing recent developments and identifying new potential collaborations.

Invited speakers

The event will be animated by a fantastic set of speakers:

Michele Allegra (Padova)
Fabio Anselmi (Baylor & Trieste)
Nicolas Brunel (Duke)
SueYeon Chung (Flatiron, NYU)
Alessandro Ingrosso (ICTP)
Kamesh Krishnamurty (Princeton)
Francesca Mastrogiuseppe (Champalimaud)
ClÃ©lia de Mulatier (Amsterdam)
Giuliano Iurilli (IIT)
Kishore Kuchibhotla (Johns Hopkins)
Tatyana Sharpee (Salk Institute)

Organisers

N Alex Cayco Gajic (ENS Paris)
Andrew Saxe (Gatsby Unit & UCL)
Eugenio Piasini (SISSA)
Sebastian Goldt (SISSA)

Attendance

Attendance is free, but we ask attendees to register so that we can keep track of the numbers. If you are planning on coming, please register using this form.

More information, including the schedule, soon to come!
